Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a limited-time access to our VIP customer support. I'm confident that you'll find the investment worthwhile. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
